pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> List.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
### PR summary [6fdcbd8f1e](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20556/commits/6fdcbd8f1e85f2387d167a2b77458e84cbd73a69)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ IsNilpotent.mk`
`+ IsNilpotent.nilpotent`
`+ IsSolvable.mk`
`+ IsSolvable.solvable`
`+ LieRing.IsNilpotent`
`+ coe_derivedSeries_eq_int`
`+ coe_lowerCentralSeries_eq_int`
`+ instance (A : LieIdeal R L) [IsSolvable L] : IsSolvable A`
`+ instance (priority := 100) LieAlgebra.isSolvable_of_isNilpotent (L : Type v)`
`+ instance (priority := 100) ofAbelianIsSolvable [IsLieAbelian L] : IsSolvable L := by`
`+ instance (priority := 100) trivialIsNilpotent [IsTrivial L M] : IsNilpotent L M`
`+ instance : LieModule ℤ L M`
`+ instance [H.IsCartanSubalgebra] : LieRing.IsNilpotent H`
`+ instance [IsNoetherian R M] : IsNilpotent L (shiftedGenWeightSpace R L M χ)`
`+ instance [IsSolvable L] : IsSolvable (⊤ : LieSubalgebra R L) := by`
`+ instance [h : LieRing.IsNilpotent L] : LieRing.IsNilpotent (⊤ : LieSubalgebra R L)`
`+ isSolvable_iff`
`- LieAlgebra.IsNilpotent`
`- instance (A : LieIdeal R L) [IsSolvable R L] : IsSolvable R A`
`- instance (priority := 100) LieAlgebra.isSolvable_of_isNilpotent (R : Type u) (L : Type v)`
`- instance (priority := 100) ofAbelianIsSolvable [IsLieAbelian L] : IsSolvable R L := by`
`- instance (priority := 100) trivialIsNilpotent [IsTrivial L M] : IsNilpotent R L M`
`- instance [H.IsCartanSubalgebra] : LieAlgebra.IsNilpotent R H`
`- instance [IsNoetherian R M] : IsNilpotent R L (shiftedGenWeightSpace R L M χ)`
`- instance [IsSolvable R L] : IsSolvable R (⊤ : LieSubalgebra R L) := by`
`- instance [h : LieAlgebra.IsNilpotent R L] : LieAlgebra.IsNilpotent R (⊤ : LieSubalgebra R L)`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

:v: jcommelin can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12664647442/job/35293096792)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12664647442/job/35293096927)

Just three suggestions (which I'm quite keen on) but otherwise LGTM.

Thanks for doing this!

bors d+

Just three suggestions (which I'm quite keen on) but otherwise LGTM.

Thanks for doing this!

bors d+

How about instead:
```suggestion
theorem coe_lowerCentralSeries_eq_int [LieModule R L M] (k : ℕ) :
    (lowerCentralSeries R L M k : Set M) = (lowerCentralSeries ℤ L M k : Set M) := by
  sorry
```
After all, the what `lowerCentralSeries_scalars` is really saying is that the `lowerCentralSeries` is also just a property of the Lie ring / Lie ring module.

Similarly here, how about:
```suggestion
theorem coe_derivedSeries_eq_int (k : ℕ) :
    (derivedSeries R L k : Set L) = (derivedSeries ℤ L k : Set L) := by
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Algebra/Lie): make IsNilpotent and IsSolvable independent of scalars
